xtreme1-io/xtreme1

Multimodal training data platform for 3D LiDAR and images

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Toolkit for fine-tuning and training large language and vision models
  • Multimodal system for streaming video and audio interactions
  • Unified model for photogrammetry subtasks
  • Generates maps and 3D models from drone imagery
  • multimodal AI model for text, image, and video tasks
  • Skywork R1V: multimodal reasoning model extending R1-series LLMs to images and text, open-source, efficient transfer, 38B parameters
  • MLX: array framework for machine learning on Apple silicon
  • LiDAR SLAM at 400 FPS on KITTI
  • Declarative infrastructure for storing and processing multimodal AI data with Python
